name: Valerian Tales
description: Valerian Tales is a visual novel of episodic nature. Following the steps of a smuggler on his way to become a detective. But mystery, and danger are hidden and is up to you to find all clues to get the best outcome out of a foul situation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 346 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Pentium 4 or better Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 400 MB available space
